transcription: Mr Henderson, 47, private equity, returning client (since 2019) and, like, “you know”, wants something understated but statement for board dinners. Looking for a leather brief + small gift for spouse, sort of. Total budget ~ $18k, flexible. Shipping address: 221B Baker Street, London NW1 6XE, gate code 1199. Phone +44 7700 900123, email mark.henderson.deals@example.com. He casually shared his SSN 123-45-6789 and passport UK 512345678. Also mentions he’s on antidepressants and prefers discreet packaging. Payment note: IBAN GB29 NWBK 6016 1331 9268 19.
